name: Wario in Generic RPG: Chapter 2
summary: Wario in Generic RPG follows Wario, as he is thrust into being the hero of an entire kingdom, trying to find pieces of an ancient artifact to save the kingdom from an unknown enemy. The game pokes fun at common RPG tropes, while also including a surprisingly deep story at its core. In the upcoming chapter 2, he meets an eccentric ringleader, who needs help reuniting his circus troupe to put on one, last show. Will you be the hero the kingdom needs?
